required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Multi-dose, Dose Escalation Study to Evaluate the Safety, Tolerability, Pharmacokinetics, and Pharmacodynamics of DDO-3055 Tablets in Healthy Subjects.
clinical_study.official_title: A Study on the Safety, Tolerability, Pharmacokinetics and Pharmacodynamics of Multi-dose DDO-3055 Tablets in Healthy Subjects-Randomized, Double-blind, Dose Escalation, Placebo Controlled Phase I Clinical Trial.

brief_summary.textblock: The study is being conducted to evaluate the safety, tolerability, pharmacokinetics and pharmacodynamics of multi-dose DDO-3055 tablets in healthy subjects for 7 days.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: Multi-dose, dose escalation study in healthy subjects.
study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.measure: Number of Subjects with Adverse Events (AE)

secondary_outcome.measure: Area under the plasma concentration versus time curve (AUC) on Day 1 and Day 7
Peak plasma concentration (Cmax) on Day 1 and Day 7
Time to maximum plasma concentration (Tmax) on Day 1 and Day 7
Change of endogenous erythropoietin from baseline :Day 1 and Day 7
Change of VEGF from baseline :Day 1 and Day 7
Change of Serum Iron from baseline

intervention.description: Low dose：DDO-3055 tablets for 7 days or Placebo for 7 days
Medium dose：DDO-3055 tablets for 7 days or Placebo for 7 days
High dose：DDO-3055 tablets for 7 days or Placebo for 7 days
